title: Trump Deploys National Guard to Chicago, Faces Legal Challenge Over Portland
snippets: The decision late on Sunday comes a day after the same judge barred the deployment of troops from the state of Oregon.
The deployment would mark the latest escalation of Donald Trump’s use of US federal intervention in Democrat-led cities.

A judge has issued a ruling temporarily blocking Donald Trump's effort to send the National Guard to Portland. Trump says troops are needed to clamp down on protests against federal immigration operations in the city.

<a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMikAFBVV95cUxQSU83ZkFnMmR4eDlDN2l1Rk1DbVNjclFRaHM4VWZWcG1UWUJkbERQTE13MDBHTWVNRFRDcE1tWTc3NGx2TFJJTHRHN2pGQXROZ3FzR2I5Ny13eGpHSkZwVnBnOTA0YXU2bl9NUDdCbGtYZzRoS1Rvb05MMGVWYVJqQjRRNTJ1aUpIZG9WRFRaN3o?oc=5" target="_blank">Judge temporarily blocks Trump f

<a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMieEFVX3lxTE1SNEQwYU1yYjl5Z2JlOXhkTWVGR0V1QXVXNTZXZTlOdEhPNU50MXlkOHNBcE5hVDBKeV9uYmJaUGxjLVZjdjFoaVUwbk91WTZvSkY0QjlSR0VINGF3R0tXZTNWZjFSempoclpWblNGcktuNERETmVJZw?oc=5" target="_blank">Newsom says Trump sent California National Guard troops to Oregon
A federal judge barred Trump from deploying National Guard troops to Oregon after the California Guard was sent to the state Sunday.
Trump attempted to deploy the California and Texas National Guard in Portland after a judge halted his bid to send Oregon National Guard troops to the city.
A federal judge already temporarily blocked the Trump administration from deploying the Oregon National Guard.
“This action circumvents the court’s decision and threatens to inflame a community that has remained peaceful,” Portland's mayor said.
titles: Judge blocks Trump from sending troops from California to Portland
Gov Newsom says Trump is sending California National Guard troops to Oregon
Judge blocks Trump's attempts to deploy troops to Portland
Judge temporarily blocks Trump from any sending National Guard troops to Oregon - Axios
Newsom says Trump sent California National Guard troops to Oregon - Axios
Judge blocks Trump from deploying California National Guard — or any Guard troops — in Oregon
Judge Blocks Trump’s Deployment Of National Guard Troops From Any State In Oregon
Trump Sending California National Guard To Portland After Judge Blocked Oregon Guard Deployment, Newsom Says
Trump sends California National Guard to Oregon after judge blocks him from using that state’s troops in Portland
summary: President Trump authorized the deployment of 300 Illinois National Guard members to Chicago as part of his immigration and crime crackdown, while also attempting to send troops to Portland, Oregon. However, the deployment to Portland was blocked by a federal judge. In response, Trump is trying to send 300 California National Guard members instead, leading California Governor Newsom to announce plans to sue the White House. This marks an escalation in Trump's use of federal intervention in Democrat-led cities.

title: Indonesia School Collapse Death Toll Hits 50; Search for Missing Continues
snippets: The collapse of the Al Khoziny Islamic boarding school is the country's deadliest disaster this year.
Rescue teams search for survivors in Indonesia as the boarding school collapse death toll rises to at least 40.
A week after a school building collapsed in Indonesia, rescuers are still searching for missing people. So far, at least 50 bodies have been recovered.

Excavators used to remove rubble while 14 people reportedly still unaccounted for and police allege building work was being carried out without a permit

Indonesian rescuers searching for missing students after a prayer hall at an
titles: Death toll from Indonesia school collapse rises to 54
Parents see tragedy, not fault, in Indonesia school collapse
Death toll from Indonesia school collapse climbs to at least 50
Indonesia school collapse death toll reaches 54 as search for missing students continues
summary: The collapse of the Al Khoziny Islamic boarding school in Indonesia has become the country's deadliest disaster this year, with the death toll rising to at least 50. Rescue teams continue their search for survivors, with 14 people still missing. The collapse occurred while building work, reportedly conducted without a permit, was underway. Excavators are being used to remove rubble as the search for missing students persists.

title: Rescue Efforts Underway for Hikers Trapped on Everest's North Slope
snippets: Rescue workers were helping hundreds of hikers trapped by heavy snow at tourist campsites on a slope of Mount Everest in Tibet, Chinese state media said late Sunday.
A snowstorm has pinned down climbers on the Tibetan side of Mount Everest. Tents were damaged just below the northern slope's base camp with casualties reported and rescue roads initially blocked.
The snowfall buried tents and reduced visibility. The local authorities said that they were in contact with the hikers and that rescue efforts were underway.
titles: Snowstorm traps hundreds of hikers on Mount Everest during China's national holiday
Blizzard strands hundreds of climbers on Mount Everest
Snowstorm Traps Hundreds of Everest Hikers
summary: Rescue workers in Tibet are assisting hundreds of hikers trapped by a snowstorm on Mount Everest's northern slope. Chinese state media reported that tents at tourist campsites were damaged, and there are casualties. The heavy snowfall has buried tents and blocked rescue roads, but local authorities are in contact with the hikers and rescue efforts are ongoing.

title: Patriots Upset Unbeaten Bills in Week 5 NFL Action
snippets: Our NFL Nation reporters answer the biggest questions out of each game. Here's what we learned from Week 5.
Here are the Week 5 grades for every team that played
Week 5 was a good one for statement wins, but none bigger or louder than the Patriots’ gutsy 23-20 effort over the Bills. Emily Sadler has more takeaways from a busy Sunday of football.

NFL Week 5 grades: Patriots earn 'A-' for upset win over Bills, Ravens get a big 'F' for ugly loss
NFL Week 5 Takeaways: Maye delivers statement performance as Patriots top Bills
summary: In Week 5 of the NFL, the New England Patriots defeated the previously unbeaten Buffalo Bills, marking a significant upset. NFL Nation reporters provided insights and grades for every team that played during the week, highlighting key performances and outcomes from the games.

title: Former England Rugby Captain Lewis Moody Diagnosed with MND at 47
snippets: Speaking to BBC Breakfast's Sally Nugent, 2003 Rugby World Cup winner and former England captain Lewis Moody reveals that he has been diagnosed with motor neurone disease (MND).

Former World Cup winner, 47, tells BBC he has been diagnosed with motor neurone disease

Lewis Moody, the former England rugby captain and 2003 World Cup winner, has been diagnosed with motor neurone disease.

The 47-year-old told the BBC he was having trouble accepting what the news me
Former England captain Lewis Moody has revealed he has been diagnosed with motor neurone disease.
titles: 'It's difficult to receive' - Moody on MND diagnosis
Former England rugby captain Lewis Moody reveals MND diagnosis
Former England captain Moody diagnosed with motor neurone disease
summary: Lewis Moody, the former England rugby captain and 2003 World Cup winner, has announced in an interview with BBC Breakfast that he has been diagnosed with motor neurone disease (MND) at the age of 47.

title: Israel, Hamas to Hold Indirect Talks in Egypt on Gaza Peace Plan
snippets: Israel and Hamas set to hold indirect talks on Monday to discuss a US-led initiative largely accepted by both sides.
Hamas responded positively to President Donald Trump's proposal for peace in Gaza, though said more negotiations will be needed before a full agreement can be signed.
Israel and Hamas are set to gather in Egypt for indirect talks over a U.S.-backed plan to end the Gaza war after months of deadlock.
titles: Israel strikes Gaza, killing 24 before Egypt talks on Trump ceasefire plan
Israel-Gaza live updates: Egypt to host ceasefire talks with Hamas and Israel
Gaza ceasefire talks underway in Egypt, as Israel strikes enclave
summary: Israel and Hamas are scheduled for indirect talks in Egypt on Monday to discuss a U.S.-led peace initiative for Gaza, which both parties have largely accepted. Despite Hamas's positive response to President Trump's proposal, they noted that further negotiations are required for a full agreement. The talks aim to conclude months of deadlock and work towards ending the Gaza war.

title: Yesavage's No-Hit Game and Guerrero's Slam Propel Blue Jays to 2-0 ALDS Lead
snippets: Yesavage allowed no hits and struck out 11 of the 18 batters he faced on Sunday
Trey Yesavage said he was built for this kind of opportunity. On Sunday afternoon, he went out and proved it.

Vladimir Guerrero Jr. hit a grand slam, Daulton Varsho hit two of Toronto's five homers and Trey Yesavage was masterful in his fourth career big-league start as the Blue Jays defeated the New York Yankees 13-7 on Sunday to take a 2-0 lead in the American League Division Series.
Blue Jays manager John Schneider tinkered with his lineup for Game 2 of the American League Division Series against star left-hander Max Fried and the New York Yankees on Sunday afternoon.

Trey Yesavage recorded a franchise-best 11 strikeouts through 5.1 hitless innings, Vladimir Guerrero Jr. hit a grand slam, and Daulton Varsho recorded two homers and two doubles to lead the Toronto Blue Jays to a 13-7 win over the New York Yankees.
titles: Trey Yesavage shuts down Yankees in ALDS Game 2 as Blue Jays rookie sets franchise strikeout record
Blue Jays outscore Yankees 13-7 in Game 2 of ALDS
Blue Jays beat Yankees 13-7 in Game 2 of ALDS
Blue Jays manager tinkers with lineup for Game 2
MLB Game 2 Highlights: Blue Jays 13, Yankees 7
summary: Trey Yesavage delivered a no-hit performance with 11 strikeouts in his fourth big-league start, leading the Toronto Blue Jays to a 13-7 victory over the New York Yankees. This win gave the Blue Jays a 2-0 lead in the ALDS. Vladimir Guerrero Jr. contributed with a grand slam, while Daulton Varsho hit two of Toronto's five home runs. The team's performance has been historically significant, matching their home run tally (eight) with fewer strikeouts (seven) across two games.

title: White House Advisor Hopes for Deal to End Shutdown Amid Tax Credit Dispute
snippets: <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMihwFBVV95cUxNU0pXd1FFQ2xva1lRY3Y5WGNlbjkyekVyY184TGdRZjNiMmxEajk2ZFdUcFRqYmtpQ1gxb1QxYVd4akVnMUluUC1GWDBuckdpQ2ZLQ016eGJxOExQSnJBVThjUHAwdGdHcnhiWVduc0xuV3hnSEd0SG54QzV3bEI4VlA5ZTFiZ00?oc=5" target="_blank">Trump adviser: Layoffs will start if shutdow
Democrats are holding firm on their health-care demands, pushing to include a permanent extension of enhanced premium tax credits in funding legislation.
Top White House economic advisor Kevin Hassett said he's hopeful lawmakers can reach an agreement to end the government shutdown before layoffs begin.
titles: Trump adviser: Layoffs will start if shutdown negotiations are "going nowhere" - Axios
'There will start to be layoffs' if Trump decides shutdown talks have stalled, Hassett says
Kevin Hassett says 'there will be layoffs' if Trump decides shutdown talks are not progressing
summary: Top White House economic advisor Kevin Hassett expressed hope for an agreement to end the government shutdown and prevent layoffs. The deadlock persists as Democrats demand a permanent extension of enhanced premium tax credits in the funding legislation.

title: Trump Optimistic on Israel-Hamas Talks Amid Gaza Violence
snippets: US President Donald Trump said he believes negotiations involving Israel and Hamas will go “very quickly”.

Talks on Monday expected to focus on release of hostages and end to war, after Israel kills 63 people in Gaza in past day

Donald Trump has urged negotiators to “move fast” in talks focused on the release of hostages held by Hamas in Gaza and a broader end to the war, as representatives arri
titles: Trump predicts Gaza ceasefire talks will go ‘very quickly’
Trump urges negotiators to ‘move fast’ as Gaza ceasefire talks set to begin in Egypt
summary: US President Donald Trump expressed optimism about the speed of negotiations between Israel and Hamas, focusing on the release of hostages and ending the conflict. This comes as talks are set to begin, following a deadly day in Gaza where 63 people were killed by Israeli forces. Trump has urged for quick action in these discussions.

title: Typhoon Matmo Strikes China; 350K Evacuate, Hurricane Priscilla Forms Near Mexic
snippets:
About 350,000 flee homes as heavy rain and winds sweep region, while Hurricane Priscilla forms near Mexico

Typhoon Matmo made landfall on the southern coast of China on Sunday afternoon, shortly after sweeping across the island province of Hainan. The powerful storm forced the evacuation of
The tropical cyclone disrupted transportation, forced more than 151,000 evacuations and raised fears of flooding as it barreled toward Guangdong Province.
titles: Weather tracker: Typhoon Matmo batters southern China
Typhoon Matmo Makes Landfall in Southern China
summary: Typhoon Matmo hit China's southern coast and Hainan island, causing about 350,000 people to flee their homes. The storm led to over 151,000 evacuations, disrupted transportation, and raised flooding fears in Guangdong Province. Concurrently, Hurricane Priscilla formed near Mexico.

title: British Carmaker Blames Shortfall on Economy, Trump Policies, Cyber-Attack
snippets: British carmaker blames global economic slowdown and Donald Trump’s trade policies for shortfall

Carmaker blames weaker demand on Trump policies amid supply chain pressures after Jaguar Land Rover cyber-attack

  • B
titles: Aston Martin issues profit warning citing US tariff impact
Aston Martin warns on profits amid US tariffs and seeks ‘proactive support’
summary: A British carmaker attributes its financial shortfall to the global economic slowdown and Donald Trump's trade policies, citing weaker demand and supply chain pressures exacerbated by a cyber-attack on Jaguar Land Rover.

title: Judge Halts Trump Admin's Plan to Send National Guard to Oregon
snippets: A federal judge late Sunday night blocked the Trump administration from deploying any National Guard units to Oregon, including hundreds of out-of-state soldiers.
The Trump administration's attempt to deploy members of the California National Guard to Portland was in "direct contravention" of a court order issued on Saturday.
titles: Federal judge again blocks National Guard deployment to Oregon
Judge to block 'deployment of any National Guard' to Oregon
summary: A federal judge blocked the Trump administration from deploying National Guard units to Oregon, including out-of-state soldiers. This decision, made late Sunday night, came after an attempt to send California National Guard members to Portland was found to be in direct violation of a court order issued the previous Saturday.

title: Trump to Host UFC Fight at White House on 80th Birthday
snippets: <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiigFBVV95cUxQbC10Z3g4dkctYWdWVHFsLTd3ckszOVhjVlRSVWItZ1FEMEhwb0ppMjZTQk96ZGFGbnpoaDdwaUprbE5XTVdMOHluakJubFdGbmRPak1QNjZ4NEN3ZEdLUExTcFNpZVQ5bzNSTWlsZWVxNTJkQThEWnFmZmw4WlJ5T1BXalBtRlNEaEE?oc=5" target="_blank">Trump to host UFC fight at White House o

titles: Trump to host UFC fight at White House on his 80th birthday - Axios
Trump says White House to host UFC fight on his 80th birthday
summary: President Donald Trump announced that an Ultimate Fighting Championship (UFC) fight will be hosted at the White House on his 80th birthday. This event was previously scheduled for July 4 but has been confirmed for Trump's birthday by both him and UFC president Dana White.

title: Kasatkina Cites Mental, Emotional Toll of Tennis Schedule
snippets: World number 19 Daria Kasatkina says the schedule is "too much, mentally and emotionally".
World number 19 Daria Kasatkina says the schedule is "too much, mentally and emotionally".
titles: 'I'm at breaking point' - Kasatkina ends season early
'I'm at breaking point' - Kasatkina ends season
summary: Tennis player Daria Kasatkina, ranked 19th globally, expressed concerns about the demanding schedule being overwhelming mentally and emotionally. She highlighted the strain faced by players due to the rigorous nature of the sport.

title: Patriots Beat Bills 23-20, End NFL's Undefeated Streak
snippets: The New England Patriots defeated the Buffalo Bills to leave the NFL without an unbeaten team just five weeks into the season.

Drake Maye led the Patriots on a 37-yard drive to set up Andy Borregales’ 52-yard field goal with 15 seconds left, and New England beat the Buffalo Bills 23-20 on Sunday night, leaving the NFL without an undefeated team five weeks into the season.
titles: Patriots upset Bills to leave NFL without an unbeaten team
Drake Maye leads Patriots to win over Bills, leaving NFL without an unbeaten team
summary: The New England Patriots won against the Buffalo Bills 23-20, with Andy Borregales scoring a 52-yard field goal with 15 seconds remaining. This victory, led by Drake Maye's 37-yard drive, marked the end of the NFL having an undefeated team just five weeks into the season.

title: Macron Forms New French Government Amid Political Crisis and Criticism
snippets:
Rivals say president’s latest cabinet represents unwelcome continuity and hard-left party vows to file no-confidence motion amid fraught budget talks

French president Emmanuel Macron has named a new government as he struggles to pull the country out of a political crisis, while rivals threa
There were significant holdovers from the previous cabinet, but President Emmanuel Macron also named several newcomers, including Bruno Le Maire, a veteran centrist politician, as defense minister.
titles: Macron appoints new French government in attempt to end political deadlock
Macron Appoints French Cabinet, but Doubts Over Government’s Stability Persist
summary: French President Emmanuel Macron has formed a new government, aiming to navigate France out of a political crisis. Despite introducing new members like centrist Bruno Le Maire as defense minister, the cabinet has faced criticism for maintaining significant continuity from its predecessor. Amidst fraught budget negotiations, a hard-left party has announced plans to file a no-confidence motion against Macron's administration.

title: Nikkei 225 Surges 4.6% on Fiscal Spending Hopes; Yen Declines
snippets: The Nikkei 225 Index was up 4.6% while the yen slumped. Takaichi is considered to have an expansionary fiscal agenda for the world's fourth-largest economy.
Investors expect more fiscal spending and pressure on central bank to keep interest rates low
titles: Japan's stocks surge after Takaichi wins party vote
Japanese stocks soar and yen tumbles after Takaichi wins ruling party leadership
summary: The Nikkei 225 Index rose by 4.6% amid expectations of increased fiscal spending and continued low interest rates, following indications of an expansionary fiscal agenda by Takaichi for Japan, the world's fourth-largest economy. Concurrently, the yen experienced a decline.

title: Bad Bunny Hosts SNL Season 51 Premiere, Addresses Super Bowl Criticism
snippets: Bad Bunny returned to SNL as a host for the second time, and the musician addressed criticism over his upcoming Super Bowl performance.
Saturday Night Live kicked off its 51st season with host Bad Bunny and musical guest Doja Cat.
titles: SNL roasts Trump in season premiere, as Bad Bunny addresses Super Bowl criticism
Bad Bunny Hosts ‘SNL’ Season 51 Premiere With Doja Cat And Jon Hamm
summary: Bad Bunny hosted "Saturday Night Live" (SNL) for the second time as it launched its 51st season, with Doja Cat as the musical guest. During the episode, Bad Bunny addressed criticism regarding his upcoming Super Bowl performance.

title: France's MeToo Figure Gisèle Pelicot's Impact Fades; 51 Men Convicted
snippets: Gisèle Pelicot's dominant stance was seen as a moment in France's MeToo movement but the enthusiasm appears to be wilting.
The Frenchwoman who became a feminist icon will confront one of the men convicted after her husband drugged her and invited them to rape her over nearly 10 years.
titles: As Gisèle Pelicot faces one of her rapists in court, what has changed in France?
What to Know as Gisèle Pelicot Returns to Court for Man’s Appeal
summary: Gisèle Pelicot became a notable figure in France's MeToo movement after surviving nearly a decade of rape. However, interest in her story and the movement seems to be fading. In a related case, Husamettin Dogan, 44, was sentenced to nine years in prison during a trial where 51 men were found guilty.

title: UK Proposes Reforms to Expedite Homebuying, Cut First-Time Buyer Costs
snippets:
Proposed government overhaul of house purchase process looks at shifting some costs from buyers to sellers

Ministers are attempting to cut the time it takes to buy a home by four weeks under new proposals aimed at overhauling the housebuying process.

The UK government will also consul
The UK government is planning to reform the homebuying process in a bid to accelerate deals and save first-time buyers hundreds of pounds.
titles: UK ministers aim to speed up homebuying by four weeks
UK Plans to Speed Up Homebuying Process in Bid to Increase Sales
summary: The UK government proposes reforms to speed up the homebuying process by four weeks and reduce costs for first-time buyers by shifting some expenses from buyers to sellers. This overhaul aims to make the process more efficient and affordable.

title: Taylor Swift's Album Movie Earns $33M in U.S. Opening
snippets: Taylor Swift's "The Life of a Showgirl" album movie generated an estimated $33 million domestically.
Swift’s new album represents an epic event for the music business, with sales of her music driving the fortunes of the entire industry.
titles: Taylor Swift's 'The Life of a Showgirl' album release party snares $33 million domestically
The release of Taylor Swift’s ‘The Life of a Showgirl’ is like Super Bowl Sunday for the music industry
summary: Taylor Swift's "The Life of a Showgirl" album movie earned around $33 million in the U.S., with $15.8 million coming in on its opening day. The film is linked to Swift's latest album release.

title: "Anemone" and "Good Boy" Now Showing in Theaters
snippets: “Anemone,” triple Oscar winner Daniel Day-Lewis’ first film in eight years, is new in theaters. How soon will the drama be coming to streaming?
"Good Boy," a horror thriller that tells the film’s story from a dog’s point of view, is now in theaters. How soon will it be available to watch at home?
titles: When Is Daniel Day-Lewis’ Drama ‘Anemone’ Coming To Streaming?
When Is Dog-Led Horror Movie ‘Good Boy’ Coming To Streaming?
summary: "Anemone," starring Daniel Day-Lewis in his first film role in eight years, and "Good Boy," a horror thriller from a dog's perspective, are both currently showing in theaters. Details on when these films will be available for streaming have not been provided.
